Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Crime, Drama, Family, Mystery, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Director: Eric Radomski, Bruce Timm, Kevin Altieri, Boyd Kirkland, Frank Paur, Dan Riba
Writer: Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Alan Burnett (story), Alan Burnett (screenplay), Paul Dini (screenplay), Martin Pasko (screenplay), Michael Reaves (screenplay)
Actors: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner, Stacy Keach
Plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
